title: I just can't deal with the level of idiocy in this game
body:
Split pusher tells team to push mid while he split pushes. What does team do? Hunt down the 1/10 Teemo and 4v1 him while the rest of the enemy team can 4v1 the split pusher without a single fuck to be given, because the dumb %%%%s that play this game have no idea how to do anything.
It's like I get put with nothing but quadriplegic r%%%%%s.
